```{r}
library(tidyverse)
iris.tibble <- as_tibble(iris)
class(iris.tibble)

tibble(
  x=1:15,
  y=1,
  z=x^2+y
)

#unusual names for tibbles:

tb <- tibble(
  ':)' = "smile",
  ' ' = "space",
  '2000' = "number"
)

tb

```
